title: Expression of Concern: Calcium Sensors and Their Interacting Protein Kinases: Genomics of the Arabidopsis and Rice CBL-CIPK Signaling Networks
content: This is an Expression of Concern regarding: Üner Kolukisaoglu, Stefan Weinl, Dragica Blazevic, Oliver Batistic, Jörg Kudla, Calcium Sensors and Their Interacting Protein Kinases: Genomics of the Arabidopsis and Rice CBL-CIPK Signaling Networks, Plant Physiology, Volume 134, Issue 1, January 2004, Pages 43–58, https://doi.org/10.1104/pp.103.033068
